short_summary: The Buyer is inviting offers for the Supply Arrangement under the Federal Supply Schedule for Storage Lockers "
description: The purpose of this notice is to notify interested suppliers that the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is holding a Active Contract Opportunity notice of potential interest for the purchasing of storage lockers. The requirement is currently capped at $ 100 000
full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement

### Notice Title
Tender for Storage Lockers

### Reference Number
WS4398756457

### Amendment Number
3

### Solicitation Number
WS4398756457

### Publication Date
2024-04-03

### Tender Closing Date
2024-04-18, 2:00 PM EDT

### Amendment Date
2024-04-11

### Expected Contract Start Date
2024-03-28

### Expected Contract End Date
Not specified

### Tender Status
Expired

### UNSPSC Codes
56101520: Lockers
56101530: Storage Cabinets

### Procurement Category
Goods and Services (GD)

### Procurement Method
Competitive – Open Bidding

### Selection Criteria
Lowest Price

### Regions of Opportunity
None

### Regions of Delivery
Ottawa, Ontario

### Contracting Agency
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

### End-User Agencies
Department of Transport (TC)

### Contact Information
Annick J. Clement (SPAC/PSPC)
annick.j.clement@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Notice URL
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19297536?extsite=MTkyOTc1MzZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Tender Description
This Notice of Public Procurement (NPP) is issued pursuant to PWGSC Supply Arrangement (SA) #E60PQ-140003/C and involves the purchase of storage lockers to Ottawa, Ontario. The storage lockers are required for delivery and installation by August 30, 2024. The full Request for Bid (RFB) and attachments can be accessed and downloaded when logged into your SAP Ariba account.

### Amendment to Response Deadline
Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by April 18, 2024, at 2:00 PM EDT. All bids submitted after this time will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

### Relevant Trade Agreements
The tender is open to bidders that can supply goods and services under the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-UK Trade Contin
